Reviews.Title: Eh.
Reviews.Author: Gala C. Young "Think About It"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my husband. I was a little disappointed that it didn't come with a charger. I guess that is my fault for not checking to make sure it did (luckily we had one laying around from a previously deceased phone). However, charging it is difficult. My husband has to wiggle the cord and set the phone down a certain way for it to charge. ?! Other than that, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Motorola Razr Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Clara Marcum
Reviews.Content: Motorola Razr Cell Phonei hate it, i wont even work, it dont light up or anything, what a rip off. not satisfied with it
